attributes.action: To return frontline troops from Afghanistan unless or until the reinforcements of helicopters, personnel carriers and manpower requested by the military are provided immediately by the Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the systemic failure to provide adequate or sufficient numbers of troops and materials in the historically difficult theatre of war of Afghanistan is putting the lives of British troops on the ground at increased risk and should be remedied immediately.
